研究发现一项小儿研究的研究发现，身体健康水平较高的学龄前儿童在记忆，注意力和解决问题的任务中的表现明显更好，从而强调了运动在早期认知发展中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/preschoolers-with-better-fitness-have-have-have-sharper-brains-brins-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/preschoolers-with-better-fitness-have-have-sharper-brains-brains-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A05156B-8B-8B31-485D-BAF5-CBE170BA62C4 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 23:12:00 -0500 Preschoolers with better fitness have sharper brains, study finds

研究发现，早期生命增长塑造了成人身高，但对青春期的时机影响不大。早期生命的增长与青春期的生长和成人身高密切相关，但并没有显着影响青春期的时机，强调了遗传学和早期发展的复杂相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/early-life-growth-shapes-adult-height-height-height-but-has-little-fittle-fittle-fittle-menfect-on-puberty-on-puberty-timing-timing-timing-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/early-life-growth-shapes-adult-height-height-height-but-has-little-fittle-effect-on-puberty-on-puberty-timing-timing-timing-timing-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41785938-e366-437e-a2fe-ddb9731ac197 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 22:22:00 -0500 Early life growth shapes adult height but has little effect on puberty timing, study finds
